meanings.definition: An antibiotic substance derived from Bacillus brevis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed tyrothricin to fight the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent2: I took tyrothricin to help me get better from the infection.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the tyrothricin, so they ran away!
meanings.sent4: Tyrothricin was like a superhero fighting off the bacteria invaders.
meanings.sent5: The tyrothricin worked tirelessly to defeat the harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: After taking tyrothricin, I started feeling better.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended tyrothricin for the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the tyrothricin was my tiny bacteria-fighting army.
meanings.sent4: Tyrothricin acted like a shield, protecting me from the bacterial attack.
meanings.sent5: The tyrothricin swiftly targeted and eliminated the harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: A topical ointment for skin infections.
meanings.sent1: I applied the tyrothricin directly to the infected area.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended using tyrothricin for the skin infection.
meanings.sent3: The tyrothricin felt like a soothing balm on my skin.
meanings.sent4: Tyrothricin was a magical potion that healed my skin infection.
meanings.sent5: The tyrothricin ointment quickly cleared up the skin infection.
